languages.text:
Whenever any creature (enemy or ally) dies in combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies with Conviction — Heretical gain +1 to all their characteristics until the end of combat.
Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.
languages.original_text:
Каждый раз, когда какое-либо существо (как враг, так и союзник) погибает в бою, Вольный Торговец и его союзники с убеждением Еретик получают +1 ко всем характеристикам до конца боя.
Каждый раз, когда флагман Вольного Торговца уничтожает любой пустотный корабль в космическом бою, флагман восстанавливает 5% от максимальной целостности корпуса.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever any creature (enemy or ally) dies in combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies with Conviction — Heretical gain +1 to all their characteristics until the end of combat.
Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.

Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.

Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.

Каждый раз, когда какое-либо существо (как враг, так и союзник) погибает в бою, Вольный Торговец и его союзники с убеждением Еретик получают +1 ко всем характеристикам до конца боя.
Каждый раз, когда флагман Вольного Торговца уничтожает любой пустотный корабль в космическом бою, флагман восстанавливает 5% от максимальной целостности корпуса.

Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.

languages.text:
Chaque fois qu'une créature (ennemie ou alliée) meurt au combat, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et ses alliés qui ont la conviction Hérétique gagnent 1 point à toutes leurs caractéristiques jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Si le vaisseau amiral {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} détruit un vaisseau spatial, le vaisseau amiral récupère 5 % de l'intégrité maximale de sa coque.
languages.original_text:
Whenever any creature (enemy or ally) dies in combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies with Conviction — Heretical gain +1 to all their characteristics until the end of combat.
Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois qu'une créature (ennemie ou alliée) meurt au combat, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et ses alliés qui ont la conviction Hérétique gagnent 1 point à toutes leurs caractéristiques jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Si le vaisseau amiral {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} détruit un vaisseau spatial, le vaisseau amiral récupère 5 % de l'intégrité maximale de sa coque.

Chaque fois qu'une créature (ennemie ou alliée) meurt au combat, le Libre-Marchand et ses alliés qui ont la conviction Hérétique gagnent 1 point à toutes leurs caractéristiques jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Si le vaisseau amiral du Libre-Marchand détruit un vaisseau spatial, le vaisseau amiral récupère 5 % de l'intégrité maximale de sa coque.

languages.text:
Stirbt eine feindliche oder verbündete Kreatur im Kampf, erhalten {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und alle Verbündeten mit Ketzer-Überzeugung bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 auf alle ihre Eigenschaften.
Wenn das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ein Raumschiff im Raumkampf zerstört, stellt das Flaggschiff 5 % seiner maximalen Rumpfintegrität wieder her.
languages.original_text:
Whenever any creature (enemy or ally) dies in combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies with Conviction — Heretical gain +1 to all their characteristics until the end of combat.
Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn eine Kreatur (feindlich oder verbündet) im Kampf stirbt, erhalten {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und alle Verbündeten mit der Ketzer-Überzeugung bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 auf alle ihre Eigenschaften.
Immer wenn das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ein Raumschiff im Raumkampf zerstört, stellt das Flaggschiff 5 % seiner maximalen Rumpfintegrität wieder her.

Immer wenn eine Kreatur (feindlich oder verbündet) im Kampf stirbt, erhalten {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und alle Verbündeten mit der Ketzer-Überzeugung bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 auf alle ihre Eigenschaften.
Immer wenn das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ein Raumschiff im Raumkampf zerstört, stellt das Flaggschiff 5 % seiner maximalen Rumpfintegrität wieder her.

languages.text:
いずれかの生物（敵味方問わず）が戦闘で死亡した時、自由開拓者と信念（異端者）を持つ味方は戦闘終了まですべての特性が+1される。
宇宙戦で自由開拓者の旗艦がヴォイドシップを破壊した時、旗艦の船体の完全性が最大値の5%回復する。
languages.original_text:
Whenever any creature (enemy or ally) dies in combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies with Conviction — Heretical gain +1 to all their characteristics until the end of combat.
Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.

traits.locale_text:
いずれかの生物（敵味方問わず）が戦闘で死亡した時、ローグトレーダーと信念（異端者）を持つ味方は戦闘終了まですべての能力が+1される。
宇宙戦でローグトレーダーの旗艦がいずれかのヴォイドシップを破壊した時、旗艦の船体の完全性が最大値の5%回復する。

languages.text:
每当任何生物（无论敌我）在战斗中死亡时，行商浪人与所有拥有“信条：异端主义”的盟友所有属性提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。
太空战斗期间，每当行商浪人的旗舰摧毁任意虚空舰时，旗舰的舰体完整度都会恢复5%。
languages.original_text:
Whenever any creature (enemy or ally) dies in combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies with Conviction — Heretical gain +1 to all their characteristics until the end of combat.
Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.

traits.locale_text:
每当任何生物（无论敌我）在战斗中死亡时，行商浪人与所有拥有“信条：异端主义”的盟友所有属性提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。
太空战斗期间，每当行商浪人的旗舰摧毁任意虚空舰时，旗舰的舰体完整度都会恢复5%。

languages.text:
Cada vez que una criatura (enemiga o aliada) muere en combate, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y sus aliados con Convicción: Hereje ganan +1 a todas sus características hasta el fin del combate.
Cada vez que la nave insignia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente destruye otra nave del vacío en combate espacial, la nave insignia recupera un 5 % de su integridad de casco máxima.
languages.original_text:
Whenever any creature (enemy or ally) dies in combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies with Conviction — Heretical gain +1 to all their characteristics until the end of combat.
Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.

Cada vez que la nave insignia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente destruye otra nave del vacío en combate espacial, la nave insignia recupera un 5 % de su integridad de casco máxima.

languages.text:
Ne zaman çatışmada bir yaratık (düşman veya dost birim) ölse Kâfirce kanaatına sahip Hür Tacir ile dost birimlerinin tüm nitelikleri +1 artar. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
Hür Tacir'in sancak gemisi, uzay çatışmasında her uçsuz gemisi imha ettiğinde sancak gemisinin maksimum gövde bütünlüğünün %5'ini geri kazanırsın.

Whenever the Rogue Trader's flagship destroys any voidship in space combat, the flagship recovers 5% of its maximum hull integrity.
